name: Sarin
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION

In the not-so-distant future. The Middle Eastern Arab country of Ajeeba is under military dictatorship. The government is trying to cover up a corruption scandal and it's up to a little girl to expose that scandal by staying alive.

Game Info

Released : 12 June, 2022

Genre: 3rd Person / Survival

Publisher : Ahmed Mo'nis

Interface language : English

Voice language: English, Arabic

Game version : v1.0.0

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

Recommended minimum system requirements:

- Requires 64-bit processor and operating system

- OS: GNU/LINUX Debian 11 "bullseye" OR Windows 10

- Processor: Intel Core i5 8400 OR AMD Ryzen 5 2600

- RAM: 8 GB RAM

- Video card: 3 GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 OR AMD Radeon RX 570

- Disk space: 200 MB

The game could still work with different systems than the ones mentioned above. But it may not work perfectly.

Game Features

+ Multiple Playable characters (Depending on the story)

+ Time limited level

+ Mission Oriented levels while keeping the option of area exploration
